gameDetails.name: Azul: Joker Tiles
gameDetails.description: Azul: Joker Tiles is a set of ten promotional tiles that can be used with the Azul base game. Complementing the castle's aesthetics, these special tiles also provide more depth in decision-making as they can serve as a proxy for any of the other tiles. However, their beauty comes at a price as players won't be able to score them for end of game color bonuses!
